item.title: Blink Led
item.author: cyrusncy@gmail.com (CyrusN)
item.description: Introduction Setting Python Code Introduction Making Blinking LED is just like writing a hello world programme in engineering. Setting Python Code import RPi.GPIO as GPIO import time LED = 18 GPIO.setmode(GPIO.BCM) GPIO.set(LED, GPIO.OUT) GPIO.setwarnings(False) print("Programme start.") GPIO.output(LED, True) time.sleep(0.5) GPIO.output(LED, False) time.sleep(0.5) print("Programme closed.")
